revised_title: Fossil Flora of the Culm Measures in North-West Devon and Palaeobotanical Evidence for the Age of the Beds
tldr: This study investigates the fossil flora of the Culm Measures in North-West Devon, focusing on the plant remains found in the Upper Carboniferous beds. The research aims to determine the age and horizons of these deposits, providing valuable insights into the geological history of the region.
